paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val40Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among those diagnosed with ATTR-CM, 22 underwent genetic testing, which revealed that 21 (95%) had wild-type ATTR, and 1 (5%) exhibited a transthyretin mutation (Val40Met).

functional_data.summary: The Val40Met variant is associated with transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family of the affected individual.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on genetic testing results.
variants.additional_notes: The majority of carriers were unaffected, indicating low penetrance.
key_quotes: Among those diagnosed with ATTR-CM, 22 underwent genetic testing, which revealed that 21 (95%) had wild-type ATTR, and 1 (5%) exhibited a transthyretin mutation (Val40Met).

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the information provided in the main text.
